synonyms.synonym: Hydroxy-delta-5-steroid dehydrogenase, 3 beta-and steroid delta-isomerase 2, isoform CRA_a

protein.specific_function: 3-beta-HSD is a bifunctional enzyme, that catalyzes the oxidative conversion of Delta(5)-ene-3-beta-hydroxy steroid, and the oxidative conversion of ketosteroids. The 3-beta-HSD enzymatic system plays a crucial role in the biosynthesis of all classes of hormonal steroids.

go_class.description: steroid dehydrogenase activity, acting on the ch-oh group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor
oxidoreductase activity, acting on ch-oh group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-oh group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor
intramolecular oxidoreductase activity, transposing c=c bonds
